mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: On les vent a Paris a la rue neufue nostre dame a lenseigne de Lescu de France
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Printed by Alain Lotrian and D. Janot, according to Brunet; by Jean Trepperel, according to the Hoe Catalogue.
Colophon: Fin des oeures & repues de feu Maistre Fra[n]coys Villon nouuellement imprimees a Paris. M.D.XXXIII.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Mercier. Bookplate of Robert Hoe. Inscription on t.p. dated Jan. 24, 1704. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 374.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: French poetry--To 1500
